archimate:Equipment.name: Equipment
archimate:Equipment.documentation:
Archimate 3: http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap11.html#_Toc489946107 Equipment represents one or more physical machines, tools, or instruments that can create, use, store, move, or transform materials.
Smileham: The Equipment element can be used to model other types of devices, e.g. MFDs, Printers, Cameras, etc.
